queries.description: Copying a member of a union to another causes undefined behavior.
queries.name: A member of a union must not be copied to its another member

queries.description: Copying a slice of an array to an overlapping region of the same array causes undefined behavior.
queries.name: An slice of an array must not be copied to an overlapping region of itself

RULE-8-18-1.title: Copying a member of a union to another, and copying a slice of an array to an overlapping one causes undefined behavior.
